ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Cooking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches methods of advanced cooking machines. \nUnlocks the Sweets table for makes Milk based treats and candies.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Canning Tech
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches methods of making a machine to can food to preserve them in metal. \n\nUnlocks the canning factory and ablity to can food and meals..

ResearchProjectDef.label: Classic Canning Machine
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches methods of making a machine to can food to preserve them in metal. \n\nUnlocks the billable canning machine and ablity to can food and meals..
